TestDescription.name: Apache 2.x version older than 2.2.10

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description:
[coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break][bold]Fixed in Apache httpd 2.2.10:[/bold][break][ul]
[li] [bold]low[/bold]: mod_proxy_ftp globbing XSS CVE-2008-2939[break]
A flaw was found in the handling of wildcards in the path of a FTP URL with mod_proxy_ftp. If mod_proxy_ftp is enabled to support FTP-over-HTTP, requests containing globbing characters could lead to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.
[/li]
[/ul][break]
[navy]Affected Apache versions (2.2.9, 2.2.8, 2.2.6, 2.2.5, 2.2.4, 2.2.3, 2.2.2, 2.2.0).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Check references for details about every vulnerability.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache 2.x to the latest version.
